This is a game that it is hard to recommend to new players. It can easily take 100 hours to get decent. It is not a noob-friendly game or a particularly good singleplayer experience. 

Learning smokes,flashes and molotovs is a chore. It requires real study and cooperation with your teammates for them to be maximally effective. 

If you match up against premades when you are playing alone, you are usually screwed. If they are coordinated and have a game plan against you, it will be 16 painful losses. Often, your teammates dont even speak english. It really is like chess, it is a massive disadvantage to come unprepared without knowledge of the game. 

Multiplayer agent models are a p2w problem.

This game requires chores outside of game and can feel like unappreciated work if it goes bad due to the game's competitive nature.
